attributes.action: Remove all tax on inheritance and parents giving money to their kids
attributes.additional_details: It’s not fair and punishes people that have worked for the money already payed tax once. They should be able to give it to whoever they want.
attributes.background: Remove all tax on inheritance and money given to family to help them out. The £3000 cap is not fair and people should not pay tax on things or money left to them.
